data.name: AccountWithUsernameAlreadyExists
data.value: An account with username "{accountUsername}" already exists.

data.name: BadCredentials
data.value: The username or password is incorrect.

data.name: InvalidToken
data.value: The token is invalid.

data.name: EventWithIdNotFound
data.value: No event with ID {eventId} was found.

data.name: NoFileUploaded
data.value: No file was uploaded.

data.name: ImageWithFileNameNotFound
data.value: No image '{imageFileName}' was found.

data.name: HttpContextNotAvailable
data.value: HttpContext is not available.

data.name: EventBySearchNotFound
data.value: No event with the given search criteria was found.

data.name: RoleWithTitleNotFound
data.value: No role with title '{roleTitle}' was found.

data.name: ParticipantWithIdNotFound
data.value: No participant with ID {participantId} was found.

data.name: EventWithTitleAlreadyExists
data.value: An event with title "{eventTitle}" already exists.

data.name: EventWithIdMaxParticipantsWithValueReached
data.value: Cannot register more participants for the event with ID {eventId}: maximum participants limit of {eventMaxParticipantsCount} has been reached.

data.name: EventParticipantWithKeyNotRegistered
data.value: The participant with ID {participantId} is not registered for the event with ID {eventId}.

data.name: EventParticipantWithKeyAlreadyRegistered
data.value: The participant with ID {accountId} is already registered for the event with ID {eventId}.

data.name: AccountWithIdNotFound
data.value: No account with ID {accountId} was found.

data.name: InvalidTokenIdClaimMissing
data.value: The token is invalid: the name identifier claim is missing.

data.name: InvalidTokenIdClaimInvalid
data.value: The token is invalid: the name identifier claim is invalid.

data.name: RefreshTokenMissing
data.value: The refresh token is missing.

data.name: RefreshTokenStoredForAccountWithIdNotFound
data.value: No refresh token stored for the account with ID {accountId} was found.

data.name: RefreshTokenStoredForAccountWithIdExpired
data.value: The refresh token stored for the account with ID {accountId} has expired.

data.name: EventParticipantWithKeyNotFound
data.value: No participant with ID {participantId} registered for the event with ID {eventId} was found.

data.name: LastAdministratorWithIdRemoval
data.value: Cannot remove the last administrator account with ID {accountId}. At least one administrator account must remain.

data.name: AccountRoleWithKeyAlreadyAssigned
data.value: The role with ID {roleId} is already assigned to the account with ID {accountId}.

data.name: AccountRoleWithKeyNotFound
data.value: No role with ID {roleId} assigned to the account with ID {accountId} was found.

data.name: AccountRoleWithKeyNotAssigned
data.value: The role with ID {roleId} is not assigned to the account with ID {accountId}.

data.name: LastAdministratorRoleWithKeyRevocation
data.value: Cannot revoke the administrator role with ID {roleId} from the last administrator account with ID {accountId}.

data.name: AccessTokenMissing
data.value: The access token is missing.

data.name: RoleWithIdNotFound
data.value: No role with ID {roleId} was found.

data.name: InvalidImageFileExtensionWithValue
data.value: The file has an invalid extension: '{fileExtension}'. Only image files are allowed.

data.name: InvalidImageFileContentTypeWithValue
data.value: The file has invalid content type: '{fileContentType}'. Only image files are allowed.

data.name: NotificationWithIdNotSentToAccountWithId
data.value: No notification with ID {notificationId} sent to the account with ID {accountId} was found.

data.name: NotificationWithIdNotFound
data.value: No notification with ID {notificationId} was found.

data.name: TransactionAlreadyInUse
data.value: The database context transaction is already in use.
